title: Asansol District Hospital Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Phlebotomist Post
description: Asansol District Hospital has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Phlebotomist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the Asansol District Hospital Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process,salarystructure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you are ...
